body: These conditionals mean that this code gets tested very rarely. One of the reasons I want it non-conditional is that we find bugs in how cloning and other code interacts with the world token handling early.
body_html: These conditionals mean that this code gets tested very rarely. One of the reasons I want it non-conditional is that we find bugs in how cloning and other code interacts with the world token handling early.
